description: Renalfa has acquired a 258MW solar project in Teleorman, Romania, which it expects to start commercial operation in 2027.
Romania awards a 15-year CfD contract for a 190 MW solar project, supported by the European Modernisation Fund.
Romanian power distributor Premier Energy PLC has wrapped up the acquisition of a majority stake in a company that holds the rights to a 49-MWdc solar project.
EBRD provides €12.2 million for two solar power plants in Romania.
Eurowind Energy is set to complete a €47 million PV park in Romania by mid-year.
